DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability and efficacy of albiglutide in the treatment of type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Albiglutide in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes BMI 2045kg/m2 NYHA Class II to IV heart failure females who are pregnant, lactating, or less than 6 weeks postpartum
